==Trivia==
* {{Transclude|Fontaine (Soundtrack)|FocalorsLeitmotif|section=1}}
* "''Le Souvenir avec le Crépuscule''" is the first and last verse of the poem ''Crépuscule du soir mystique'' written by {{w|Paul Verlaine}}.
* [[Jifang]] overheard this song while at a café in [[Court of Fontaine: Vasari Passage]] where she met her future husband [[Langqing]] who told her what the song is called.<ref name=Jifang>{{Ref/NPC|Jifang|s=Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness}}</ref>
